description: Moscow says a US Navy destroyer entered its territorial waters on Tuesday.
title: Russia 'threatened to ram' US ship in Sea of Japan
title_page: Russia 'threatened to ram' US ship in Sea of Japan - BBC News
maintext: According to the Russian defence ministry, its Pacific Fleet destroyer the Admiral Vinogradov used an international communications channel to warn the US ship about "the possibility of using ramming to get the intruder out of the territorial waters".
